lead_paragraph: There is no credible evidence that future Hall of Fame quarterback Peyton Manning used human growth hormone or performance-enhancing drugs as was alleged in an Al-Jazeera documentary, the National Football League said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Manning Cleared of Doping Allegations in Documentary: NFL
headline.main: Manning Cleared of Doping Allegations in Documentary: NFL

snippet: There is no credible evidence that future Hall of Fame quarterback Peyton Manning used human growth hormone or performance-enhancing drugs as was alleged in an Al-Jazeera documentary, the National Football League said on Monday....
